game.title: Echoes of Eternity
game.synopsis: In a world where time is broken, players take on the role of a Temporal Guardian tasked with restoring the timestream. As they journey through ancient ruins and futuristic cities, they must navigate the consequences of their own actions and the intentions of rival factions vying for control.
game.beginning: The game begins in a mystical realm where time is frozen, and the player meets the enigmatic Timekeeper who explains the situation and sets them on their quest.
game.ending: The final showdown takes place at the Heart of Time, a ancient temple hidden beyond the boundaries of reality. There, players must confront the mastermind behind the timestream's destruction and make a choice that will determine the fate of the world.
